con:request.name: SO create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v3" xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1" xmlns:urn4="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> <urn:standingOrder> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:recurrence>${Properties#recurrenceType}</urn1:recurrence> <urn1:dueDates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate> </urn1:dueDates> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <!--Optional:--> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:balanceTriggerType> <urn1:limitType>BELOW</urn1:limitType> <urn1:limitAmount currency="${Properties#DebitCurrency}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#BalanceLimitAmount_Above}</urn2:amount> </urn1:limitAmount> </urn1:balanceTriggerType> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:splits> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:split> <urn1:creditAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditAccount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#BalanceLimitAmount_Above}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn1:amount> </urn1:split> </urn1:splits> <urn1:paymentInfo> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation><urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority><urn3:serviceLevel>URGP</urn3:serviceLevel></urn3:paymentTypeInformation><urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency> <!--Optional:--> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentInfo> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>4502</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>testing</urn2:countrySubDivision> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>Cred</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>BALANCE</urn1:standingOrderType> </urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
